com.model.timer

Class StopWatchStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.model.timer.StopWatchStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimerStrategy

    public class StopWatchStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements TimerStrategy
    Created by ivan on 25/04/17. Implements the TimerStrategy interface such that it works as an increasing timer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void associate(Task task)
      Associates a task to a timer from which it gets the initial time, target time and mode
      long getCurrentTime()
      Gets the current time of the timer
      long getInitialTime()
      Gets the initial time of the timer
      boolean getIsStopped()
      Returns whether the timer is stopped or not
      long getTargetTime()
      Gets the target time of the timer
      Task getTask()
      Gets the task associated to this timer
      void reset()
      Resets the timer
      boolean run()
      Increments or decrements the current time of the timer until it reaches the target time
      void setMode(Mode mode)
      Sets the timer mode (it can either be UNLIMITED -- keeps counting even if the other timer hits zero or LIMITED -- stops when the other timer hits zero
      void start()
      Starts the timer
      void stop()
      Stops the timer
